How do kerbals keep sane on decades long missions or "long term assignment". do they play board games, videogames, hang out with other kerbals on board. and for that matter do kebals age, or gain weight, because I can leave one in a chair for a quarter century, and their fine with it and don't need to exercise?

Well, because new Kerbals arrive at KSC with zero training, and because the Astronaut Complex is incapable of training them, they get their training while in space. As they sit in their pods for days/months/years, they watch instructional videos over and over that teach them to perform the simple, menial tasks required of them (fix flat tires, reload Goo cannisters, etc.).
